post.text: Join me LIVE in St. Augustine, FL!

comment.author: Melani
comment.text: More there in the arena than Hillary gets, that's for sure!

replies.author: Eugene
replies.text: He'll be at the amphitheater over here in Tampa at 7 PM, trying to get off work in time to head over!

replies.author: Melani
replies.text: Oh man!! That is awesome!! How many people are there?
